name: Rick Sanchez
quote: Get out of here, Summer! You ruined the season 4 premiere!

name: Rick Sanchez
quote: That was season one! Thanks for watching!

name: Rick Sanchez
quote: And that’s the end of the Morty gets a dragon episode

name: Rick Sanchez
quote: Oh, boy, so you actually learned something today? What is this, Full House?

name: Rick Sanchez
quote: I programmed you to believe that.

name: Rick Sanchez
quote: Have fun with empowerment. It seems to make everyone that gets it really happy.

name: Rick Sanchez
quote: Listen, Morty, I hate to break it to you, but what people call love is just a chemical reaction that compels animals to breed. It hits hard, Morty, then it slowly fades, leaving you stranded in a failing marriage. I did it. Your parents are gonna do it. Break the cycle, Morty. Rise above. Focus on science.

name: Morty Smith
quote: Nobody exists on purpose. Nobody belongs anywhere. We’re all going to die. Come watch TV.

name: Rick Sanchez
quote: To live is to risk it all.

name: Morty Smith
quote: Mr. President, if I’ve learned one thing today it’s that sometimes you have to not give a f*ck!

name: Morty Smith
quote: How many of these are just horrible mistakes I made? I mean, maybe I’d stop making so many if I let myself learn from them.

name: Rick Sanchez
quote: Stealing stuff is about the stuff, not the stealing.

name: Rick Sanchez
quote: I’m sorry, but your opinion means very little to me.

name: Rick Sanchez
quote: There’s a lesson here and I’m not going to be the one to figure it out.

name: Rick Sanchez
quote: I think you have to think ahead and live in the moment

name: Rick Sanchez
quote: Listen to me, Morty. I know that new situations can be intimidating. You’re lookin’ around and it’s all scary and different, but y’know … meeting them head-on, charging into ‘em like a bull — that’s how we grow as people.

name: Rick Sanchez
quote: It’s your choice to take this personally

name: Morty Smith
quote: Sometimes science is more art than science.

name: Morty Smith
quote: Must… continue… moving… in… ways… that… lead… to… dying… with… you.

name: Jerry Smith
quote: Life is effort. I’ll stop when I die!

name: Mr. Meeseeks
quote: Having a family doesn’t mean that you stop being an individual. You know the best thing you can do for the people that depend on you? Be honest with them, even if it means setting them free.

name: Unity
quote: I realize now I’m attracted to you for the same reason I can’t be with you; you can’t change. And I have no problem with that but it clearly means I have a problem with myself.

name: Summer Smith
quote: Ooh yeah, shame me. At least when I’m disgusting it’s on purpose.

name: Jerry Smith
quote: If I’ve learned one thing, it’s that before you get anywhere in life, you gotta stop listening to yourself

name: Summer Smith
quote: Camping is just being homeless without the change.

name: Beth Smith
quote: Don’t make the same mistakes I made. Don’t deify the people who leave you.

name: Summer Smith
quote: So what if he’s the Devil, Rick? At least the Devil has a job. At least he’s active in the community.

name: Summer Smith
quote: That’s because losers look stuff up while the rest of us are carp’en all them ‘diems.

name: Summer Smith
quote: You don’t love people in hopes of a reward, Dad. You love them unconditionally.

name: Rick Sanchez
quote: You gotta do it for Grandpa, Morty. You gotta put these seeds inside your butt.
